title: I am sick and tired of having huge lag spikes in my game riot
body:
Get your guts toghether and stop using Zayo infrastructure ... PLEASE.
and why the fuck am i as a norwegian based EU server user being routed via new york?

replies.body: sounds like someone playing on wifi

Riot doesn't affect how your connection is routed to the server, that's in complete control of your ISP. If you're having routing issues, it's a good idea to reach out to your ISP to see if they know what's up. 

If you'd like, you can run a set of traceroutes using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) for 5 minutes with the IP address 104.160.131.1. Export the results at Text and paste them here so we can take a look at the routing.

Let me know if you have any questions.
In before they link you the connection issues page
